ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Diamonds? (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: As they come from the planes, they re pretty much uber loot in and of themselves.  Keep in mind also that the plat/diamond combination is the hardest to make
ygData.messageBody:
As they come from the planes, they're pretty much uber loot in and of themselves. Keep in mind also that the plat/diamond combination is the hardest to make jewelry item in the game. Thats a tough gem, sell it high if at all.
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Sent: Thursday, June 15, 2000 6:30 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Diamonds? (OT)


i only sold one, and i got 2k for it. my first offer was 500pp, then next
guy went to 750, then first guy to 1k, then 2nd guy to 2k and i sold it. i
would say 500-1000pp. the gems are not super rare, but the success rate is
extremely low.

Shada


> Anyone out there know what Diamonds sell for? Diamond jewelry pieces?
>
> thanks for the info!
>
> Kitasi Faegehearper
